title: Dragon Ball Z Special 1: Tatta Hitori no Saishuu Kessen (Dragon Ball Z: Bardock, The Father of Goku)
synopsis: Bardock, Son Goku's father, is a low-ranking Saiyan soldier who was given the power to see into the future by the last remaining alien on a planet he just destroyed. He witnesses the destruction of his race and must now do his best to stop Frieza's i...

title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
